title: क्या पत्रकार राहुल कंवल ने कहा कि “वंदे मातरम” का जाप करना राष्ट्र-विरोधी है?
author: www.factcrescendo.com
vclaim: Here’s what happened. @indiatoday SIT exposed lawyers who accepted on camera they bashed up Kanhaiya in court while cops watched. Lawyers attacking Kanhaiya chanted Vande Mataram. To attack someone and chant Vande Mataram is anti-national. Said it then, will say it now. Jai Hind. pic.twitter.com/JybiiEXXZO
